author: Pema Chodron
message: The greatest obstacle to connecting with our joy is resentment.
title: Thought of the day

author: C. Pulsifer
message: When anger use your energy to do something productive.
title: Thought of the day

author: Blaise Pascal
message: We are all something, but none of us are everything.
title: Thought of the day

author: Albert Einstein
message: If you can't explain it simply, you don't understand it well enough.
title: Thought of the day
